title: Owlstone Medical gets cash injection for breathalyzer tech, eyes China as 'key market'
author: Ben Adams
description: British medical technology firm Owlstone Medical has completed a total $50 million (£38 million) funding round as it looks to become a commercial company. | British medical technology firm Owlstone Medical has completed a total $50 million (£38 million) funding round as it looks to become a commercial company.
